item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, April 25, 2025 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. DeepMind releases Lyria 2 music generation model (130 points | 116 comments)
2. Notation as a Tool of Thought (1979) (87 points | 16 comments)
3. OpenAI releases image generation in the API (357 points | 199 comments)

14. Ask HN: Share your AI prompt that stumps every model (239 points | 412 comments)

22. A Roman Gladiator and a Lion Met in Combat. Only One Walked Away (25 points | 29 comments)
23. Fundamental flaws of SIMD ISAs (2021) (115 points | 81 comments)
24. A Principled Approach to Querying Data – A Type-Safe Search DSL (71 points | 8 comments)
25. Henry James was not at home in America (7 points | 2 comments)

27. Bild AI (YC W25) is hiring a founding engineer in SF ( | hide)

29. Asymmetric Content Moderation in Search Markets: The Case of Adult Websites (69 points | 25 comments)
